lore: Sigmund's Pit Worms emerged in small groups in front of the Valkyries. Milner handed her Mage tunic to Helmholtz and rolled up her sleeves. One by one, she burned, buried, froze and electrocuted the two hundred calamities that the dark lord had sent against them.\n\nVicious Pit Worms spend most of their time underground, even during battles. They constantly move through the battlefield to hurt their enemies with the spikes on their backs.
menagerieDialog: (It never stops wriggling. Frankly, its mannerisms are a bit disconcerting.)
(One benefit of having this creature around is that you never need to worry about disposing of corpses.)
(It's making a disgusting noise with its mouth, not unlike a dog eating oatmeal.)
(It insists on making disgusting sucking noises with its mouth.)
name: Vicious Pit Worm
